item.title: 10 Most Expensive Christmas Movies Of All Time
item.description: With a $250 million budget, Red One is the most expensive Christmas movie ever made, but plenty of other holiday classics cost a pretty penny.

item.title: Spontaneous Ending Explained: Why The Teens Were Exploding
item.description: Spontaneous's horrific premise comes to a cautiously optimistic conclusion with the movie's ending. Here are the themes of the finale explained

item.title: Is Mystery On Mistletoe Lane Worth Watching? (& Where To Stream The Hallmark Movie)
item.description: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane brings together everything Hallmark does best, making it a solid addition to anyone's list of seasonal must-watch movies.
